structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases
Post Conviction Access To Forensic And Scientific Analysis

law.catch_line: Disclosure Of Analysis Results; Orders To Produce Data, Documents And Notes
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 38 effective May 17, 2012.] (a) The results of the analysis shall be simultaneously disclosed to the moving party, the prosecuting attorney and the court. (b) The court shall, at the request of a party or on its own initiative, order production of the underlying laboratory data, documents and notes.
